response.original_title: Jamie Cullum: The Pianoman at Christmas
response.overview: Jamie Cullum returns to the Royal Albert Hall to play his festive, perennial record The Pianoman at Christmas. Joined on stage by the big band including the talents of Kansas Smitty’s House Band featuring the Mercury nominated Joe Webb, Jamie Cullum's show delivers a festive, fun and furious set with all the trimmings. Fans can expect unique collaborations and to be taken on a journey from the romantic, solo piano ballads of "Beautiful Together" and "Christmas Don’t Let Me Down" to the instant classics "Hang Your Lights" and "It’s Christmas."
response.title: Jamie Cullum: The Pianoman at Christmas

results.name: Jamie Cullum presents ‘The Pianoman at Christmas’ live at The Royal Albert Hall
